'''Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant''' is an [[Offering System]] present in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]], accessed from [[Jinwu]]. It allows for the strengthening of the [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]], a [[gadget]] needed for exploring the underground mines.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Lumenstone Adjuvant Enhancement 1.png
|text1  = When exploring [[The Chasm: Underground Mines|The Chasm: The Underground Mines]], you will sometimes find [[Lumenspar]]s and [[Lumenstone Ore]].
|image2 = Tutorial Lumenstone Adjuvant Enhancement 2.png
|text2  = These materials can be used at [[Jinwu]]'s workbench to enhance your [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]] and obtain material rewards.
}}

==Rewards==
At level 0, the Lumenstone Adjuvant can provide illumination in a small area and activate light-sensitive mechanisms, and can store 1 Energy.

Raising the Lumenstone Adjuvant's level provide additional functions. This requires [[Lumenspar]] in chunks of eight and occasionally one [[Lumenstone Ore]].
* {{Item|Lumenspar|x=8}} to enhance each level, for a total of 80.
* {{Item|Lumenstone Ore|x=1}} to enhance to levels 2, 6, and 8, for a total of 3.

In addition to the rewards listed in the table, each increase in level also awards:
{{Card|Adventure EXP|200|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}

===Level 10 Capabilities===
While exploring The Chasm: Underground Mines and having the Lumenstone Adjuvant equipped, it will have the following capabilities:
* Disables the limitations imposed by Oozing Filth, allowing the character to perform Sprints and Alternate Sprints even within the mud.
* When filled with energy, it provides illumination for the character in a certain area while also being able to activate specific light-sensitive mechanisms
* By consuming the energy stored within the Lumenstone Adjuvant, you can recharge certain mechanisms.

Additionally, using the Adjuvant actively will trigger Blooming Light at the cost of 1 Energy.<br />Blooming Light has the following properties:
* Unleashes powerful energies to destroy Level 1 and 2 Oozing Concretions in a large AoE.
* Restores a fixed amount of Stamina.
* Can indicate the locations of nearby Lumenspar.
* Can be used once every 2s.
Lumenstone Adjuvant can store 10 Energy.
